messages.title: Demanding better for Maldon
messages.content: Colin is a local voice who will stand up in Westminster for residents throughout the constituency.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Stop Boris' disastrous Brexit to stop the breakup of the UK. Let’s then have a grown up discussion about our relationship with the EU.

issues.brexitEurope: Stop Boris' disastrous Brexit to stop the breakup of the UK. Let’s then have a grown up discussion about our relationship with the EU.

community.content: Colin founded the Maldon Festival in 2008, which has gone on to become one of the highlights of the Essex cultural calendar. Also in 2008, he helped to set up the Friends of the Moot Hall, serving as Vice Chair for several years. He works hard in the local community and volunteers in a local primary school.

leaflet.personalStatement: Wouldn’t it be wonderful to have someone representing you in parliament who has a proven record in working hard for Maldon? Colin is a professional musician who has lived in Maldon since 2007. His Essex roots run deep. His mother’s family is from Colchester and he studied at Colchester Institute.

examples: Wouldn’t it be wonderful to have someone representing you in parliament who has a proven record in working hard for Maldon?
Colin is a local voice who will stand up in Westminster for residents throughout the constituency.
He works hard in the local community and volunteers in a local primary school.
He works hard in the local community and volunteers in a local primary school.
Stop Boris' disastrous Brexit to stop the breakup of the UK.
